data.title: Lora Howard Obituary
data.meta_description: sherilaramee8@aol.com -->Howard, Lora Lee, of Huntington Beach, born on Sept. 11, 1928 in Columbia, Missouri, passed away at age 89 on June 21, 2018. Lor
data.text:
sherilaramee8@aol.com –>Howard, Lora Lee, of Huntington Beach, born on Sept. 11, 1928 in Columbia, Missouri, passed away at age 89 on June 21, 2018. Lora was the daughter of Julia and T.B. Stewart and graduated from Christian College in 1948. Lora and her husband Jim moved to California in their 20’s where they raised their family. She was an avid tennis player and played well into her 80’s. She was active in Children’s Home Society and Kiwaniannes. Lora is survived by her brother, Tom Stewart of Columbia, Mo; her 3 daughters, Sheri Laramee of Newport Beach, Cindy spouse Udo of Huntington Beach and Daina spouse Alan Kemp of San Juan Capistrano; 7 grandchildren, Meredith Hamilton, Cory Hamilton, Bryan Giesen spouse Monique, Brandon Giesen, Brett Giesen, Olivia Kemp, Lyndsey Kemp; and 2 great-grandchildren, Myles and Luna.

There will be a Celebration of Life gathering on July 28 at the Seagate Clubhouse, 16011 Bonaire Circle, Huntington Beach at 2:00 p.m.
